text.p1: I worked with Google Ads in Thimalu for a year.
text.p2: It was a great experience! There I learned a lot of teamwork, how to organize my money. I managed the site. Checked the stock, estimate the delivery time and fees, and did costumer service.

text.p1: I was hired in 2022 as an intern in Startup Sesi. I started developing IOT solutions, and Arduino prototypes. This is where I work currently.
